field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: sortOrder
field.label: Sort Order
field.description: The sort order of the images files

field.name: autoplaySpeed
field.label: Image Duration
field.description: Duration to stay on each image in ms

field.name: navigationIndicators
field.label: Use Indicator Buttons(Dots)?
field.description: Show navigation dots at bottom of slider.

field.name: slidesToLoad
field.label: Total Slide Count
field.description: Amount of slides to load. (0 for all)

field.name: slidesToShowLG
field.label: Slides to Show - LG
field.description: Amount of slides to display at one time.

field.name: slidesToShowMD
field.label: Slides to Show - MD
field.description: Amount of slides to display at one time.

field.name: slidesToShowSM
field.label: Slides to Show - SM
field.description: Amount of slides to display at one time.

field.name: slidesToShowXS
field.label: Slides to Show - XS
field.description: Amount of slides to display at one time.

field.name: slidesToScroll
field.label: Slides to Scroll
field.description: Amount of slides to change on scroll.

field.name: centerMode
field.label: Use Center Mode?
field.description: Enables centered view with partial prev/next slides. Use with odd numbered slidesToShow counts.
